trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Grantsburg
There were no other sightings in Grantsburg on or around December 14th 1998
divs: Sighting Detailsmy brother and i were in the crex meadows waiting for a friend and i was just looking around the sky i have seen other strange things in the sky at the crex meadows but i noticed lights way off in the horizon two dim ones and one bright one the bright one would fade and then get bright it seemed to dance in every direction we watched for a while it would shoot across the sky and come to a dead stop then go the opposite direction at high speed something shot out of it it looked like a shooting star but it was going up into the sky within a seconed the object was directly in front of us i could see the bright light circled the craft the bright light stopped and pointed at us i felt as if whatever it was,was interested in us my brother was in the drivers seat of our van and paniced and we hauld ass out of there when we got to the road i looked out the window to see if it was still chasing us and it was almost right obove us i got a good look at it and it was acorn shaped and it was like i could see through it we continued to drive to anybody we could find to wittness what was chasing us but when we got to town it had disapeared my brother and i have never felt that kind of fear ever there is no way to explain that kind of fear
